title: Punk buster needs to be designed so that it can differentiate between a disconnect and a leaver
body:
Punk buster needs to be designed so that it can differentiate between a disconnect and a leaver  for penalties because if you have bad internet 
 or server issues for connection you should not be penalized for this.  the penalties are to harsh for disconnects one has no control over. i hope riot fixes this feature , the punk buster is such a turn off for discouraging players from playing this game.

replies.body:
Okay I hear you, but **why **should [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) differentiate between a disconnect and a leaver?  Aren't these leaves causing 9 other players a negative experience just the same?  What about abuses?  For example, I could easily fake a leave by unplugging my PC from the internet.  

I appreciate your intent, and changes are always worth considering, but these are some issues that could get in the way.  Still, let your voice be heard and help tackle some of these concerns over at the [Player Behavior](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) boards.  The PB team and community can discuss this with you and come up with some ideas.  Good luck!
